knimeNode.name: Expand byte vector
knimeNode.shortDescription: Expands the byte vector to individual integer columns.

intro.p: This node splits the byte vector to integer columns.
The Create byte vector node generates some position and name information as column properties. You can use that information in this node.

tab.name: Standard Options
tab.option: The column containing the byte vectors
Should we remove the selected byte vector column?

option.name: Use the column indexes specified in properties?

tab.option: The new columns will be put to the specified indices if they are available.

option.name: Use the column names specified in properties?

tab.option: The available names are used instead of the generated if possible.
New column names start with this prefix.

option.name: Start index for the first new column

tab.option: The numeric part of the column will start from this index.
The values after this index in the byte vector will be omitted from the output table.

ports.inPort: Table containing at least one byte vector column.
